title: Bigbear.ai: Sell BBAI Stock At $5?
snippet: Cash (including cash equivalents) constitutes $391 million of the $599 million in Total Assets for BigBear.ai. This results in a very strong Cash-to-Assets Ratio of 65.2% (versus 6.9% for S&P 500)

title: BigBear.ai Holdings: More Pain Coming For Dip Buyers (Downgrade)
snippet: BigBear.ai Holdings, Inc. faces headwinds with execution risks, weak momentum, and stretched valuation. Click for my BBAI stock update.

title: BigBear AI (BBAI) Falls 15.8% on Dismal Earnings, Outlook
snippet: We recently published 10 Stocks That Vanished in Value BigBear.ai Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:BBAI) is one of the worst-performing stocks on Tuesday. BigBear AI fell by 15.8 percent on Tuesday to close at $5.

title: BBAI Stock Tumbles on Q2 Loss, Revenues Decline Y/Y, '25 View Down
snippet: BigBear.ai shares plunge 31.2% as Q2 revenues drop 18% Y/Y and the 2025 sales outlook is cut on Army program weakness.
